At its core DBD is a great game with tons of unique killers and survivors to play. The perk system and different maps all keep the game interesting and it has some real replayability. My problems with this game mostly comes from how painful it is to play killer. I just can' t have fun on killer anymore and survivor gets stale fast. If you plan on playing this game with friends or don't plan on sweating with killer I would say give this game a go, but if you want to play only killer I would say give this game a pass until some changes are made.
while dead by daylight has its ups and downs its still an amazing game in the long run. 9/10

杀鸡我可太爱了，17年入的坑，贼喜欢血腥暴力的杀手，讽刺的是我2017年那时候竟然是通过某五了解到的杀鸡，发现某五那是个啥？果断入坑杀鸡，那时候也听说制作组听中国玩家的建议，出了杨永信，觉得这个制作组真不错欸！！玩了没多久小心脏实在是受不了哈哈，太刺激了！！后来没怎么玩了，但是！咳咳！但是！我可以自豪地说我虽然不玩，但是4年了，杀鸡我从未卸载过，每次都会看看出没出皮肤？出没出DLC？哈哈，看看杀手人类的故事就下线就很满足！！虽然不玩很久出DLC必买！！！永远爱杀鸡！！！(破音)

Its Really Fun And Full Of Jumpscares When Playing With Friends

This game is very strange to review, at it's core. The game is very fun, and has highly enjoyable gameplay loops. But the way that Behavior (BHVR) has gone about handling the additional content (and the further balancing of previous content) has been growing progressively worse. And it's not on any track to get better. While there does seem to be some signs of life, the developers seem incredibly out of touch with their community and refuse to listen to those that carry their community ambassador title of "Fog Whisperer". Their monetization scheme is also an absolute trainwreck, linking cosmetics is an absolutely horrid idea in terms of player customization. However the game is too big to fail at this point because there is hardly any other contenders, though there are some starting to emerge. I would honestly suggest looking to another game if you're seeing cooperative survival horror.
